html:
Is this a wraith or a ghost
No, it’s just a shadow
Casted from the toilet to hall
You see it with an edge of your eye
Smell of unknown origin
Wont be that striking
Toilet next door
Becomes clean out of the sudden
Screaming on the hallway
Because the floor is wet
You think it’s a wraith again
Again you blame unholy forces
And it is like that every day
Your bed is never in order
Step away from the computer
Cause the floor needs to be clean
title: The floor
